TextBlock.Text: CEDRUS: We require some means of imparting energy to the experiment to establish initial stability. A key to wind it up of per-say.
MIACEAE: That key will need to be charged. What means of doing so would function best?
CANARAE: A singularity would work. However, we would need some means of moving it to and from the desired location.
MIACEAE: Hypothesis: the raft we found on our previous warp would function well for this purpose.
